querystring.select: SELECT CL.COLLATERAL_NO AS CollateralNo, CL.COLLATERAL_ID AS CollateralId, CL.FULL_ASSET_CODE AS FullAssetCode, CL.FULL_ASSET_CODE AS FullAssetCode, CL.COLLATERAL_PRICE_AMT AS CollateralValueAmt, CU.CUST_NAME AS CustName
querystring.from: FROM dbo.CUST CU WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.COLLATERAL CL WITH(NOLOCK) ON CL.CUST_ID = CU.CUST_ID
